rows.label: qev092103_MSG0001
rows.name: Camber! Are you all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0002
rows.name: It's...it's an angel...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0003
rows.name: If you can still joke around, you'll live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0004
rows.name: Yeah, my body's fine, at least. Head's a little fuzzy, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0005
rows.name: Thanks for coming, Alexa. You, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0006
rows.name: Do you know what happened to the others?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0007
rows.name: No.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0008
rows.name: The prototype exploded, right? Tell me about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0009
rows.name: Fernand tried to fire it at full charge, but...something jammed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0010
rows.name: It wouldn't fire. The energy just kept building, and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0011
rows.name: it went critical, then blew.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0012
rows.name: There was a bright light that swallowed up his Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0013
rows.name: I was next to him, then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0014
rows.name: Wait. Is Mika okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0015
rows.name: Um...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0016
rows.name: Alexa, if you know something, you have to tell me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0017
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0018
rows.name: Then you... Do you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev092103_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Camber that Mika died protecting him.

rows.label: qev092103_JNK0020
rows.name: Lie

rows.label: qev092103_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Camber that Mika left New LA to find her fortune.

rows.label: qev092103_JNK0030
rows.name: Mourn

rows.label: qev092103_SEL0031
rows.name: Look solemnly into Camber's eyes.

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0019
rows.name: No... NO![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0020
rows.name: That's notâ€”she didn't protect me! I protected HER![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0021
rows.name: How do I live while she dies? That's... It doesn't make sense...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0022
rows.name: She...left?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0023
rows.name: You mean, LEFT left? But where the heck would she possibly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0024
rows.name: Oh damn. Mika's dead, isn't she? She died.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0025
rows.name:
But that's not... I mean, I shielded her!
Why is she dead and I'm not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0026
rows.name: Oh. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0027
rows.name: I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0028
rows.name: Life's funny, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0029
rows.name: I shielded her from the blast. But I'm still here, and she's...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0030
rows.name: You protected her, Camber?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0031
rows.name: Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0032
rows.name:
As soon as I saw the flash,
I dove between Fernand and the other two.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0033
rows.name: I guess the blast flung me all the way out here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0034
rows.name: Really? Your Skell looks pretty clean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0035
rows.name:
Yeah. The shock wave was massive,
but the explosion itself wasn't huge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0036
rows.name:
I'm lucky it was a beam weapon.
If it were conventional explosives, I'd be dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0037
rows.name: Hey, wait a second...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0038
rows.name: You notice anything odd about Camber's Skell and the others?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_JNK0040
rows.name: Figure

rows.label: qev092103_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Alexa that the numbers don't add up.

rows.label: qev092103_JNK0050
rows.name: Examine

rows.label: qev092103_SEL0051
rows.name: Say that the damage is different.

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0039
rows.name: Yeah, that's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0040
rows.name:
There's Camber's here, plus the two at the
scene of the explosion, which makes three.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0041
rows.name: Three? But what about Hannah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0042
rows.name: No idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0043
rows.name: She may have been carried off by the blast like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0044
rows.name: But you said you shielded them from the blast, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0045
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0046
rows.name: Then hers should be in the same place as Mika's.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0047
rows.name: Exactly. And there's something else, too...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0048
rows.name: Exactly. I think that's significant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0049
rows.name: Yours was caught in the explosion, but it isn't burned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0050
rows.name: The Skells back at the test site were totally charred.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0051
rows.name: Meaning...what, exactly?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0052
rows.name: I'm not sure yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092103_MSG0053
rows.name:
Let's go back there and take another look.
We may find a clue.[ST:wait ]
